name: Fanome
holysymbol: A coin with a grinning gnomish face.
allowedalignments: Neutral, Chaotic Neutral, Chaotic Good, Chaotic Evil
appearance: Fanome's appearance varies greatly, although he typically favors that of a gnomish child.
dogma: Fanome teaches that guile and wit are the greatest of virtues.  Tales tell of the tricks he plays on his fellow gods, things such as stealing from Bahamut's hoard, and then tricking Tiamat into thinking she had perpetrated the theft, or tricking Molton into giving mortals the power to make fire without entreating him.
clergy: Fanome is widely worshipped among the Imperial Gnomes, and has a sizable following among the Stagen Gnomes as well.  Outside of the gnomes, his adherents are few and far between.
